english name: To You Who Are Looking for Your "Passion"
skill name (japanese): 壁の向こう、開かれる道
skill name (english): A Path Opened Beyond the Wall
skill effect (japanese): 6.5秒間 GOOD以上がPERFECTになり、5秒間 スコアが60％UPする
skill effect (english): All GOODs and higher will become PERFECTs for 6.5 seconds and 60% score boost for 5 seconds.
gacha phrase: きっと、見つかるんじゃないかなあ？
